items: Proficiency in SQL Server development, including T-SQL scripting, stored procedures, triggers, and functions.
Understanding of SQL Server integration services (SSIS) for ETL processes and data migration.
Solid knowledge of SQL and experience working with complex data sets.
Experienced in designing and developing databases using SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS), adept at creating and optimizing database objects such as tables, views, stored procedures, and functions.

Skilled in automating deployment processes and routine administrative tasks using Transact-SQL (T-SQL), PowerShell, or other scripting languages to improve efficiency and consistency in SQL Server management.
Fostered a collaborative team environment, encouraging knowledge sharing and skill development among team members.
Demonstrated expertise in designing, developing, and optimizing complex SQL Server databases, stored procedures, triggers, and functions to support business applications.
Served as a subject matter expert (SME) on SQL Server technologies, offering insights and recommendations on architectural decisions, performance optimizations, and scalability strategies.
